column4: One of my friend work at Yahoo. I heard that Yahoo keeps there /etc in CVS.
This is an interesting read: http://www.kitenet.net/~joey/cvshome.html
(CVS $HOME, or keeping your life in CVS.)
Mind-boggling: he has three $HOME modules, namely home-base, home-full, home-plus. ;;;
jsan: mozilla-mplayer works. mozilla-bonobo + totem also works, but is unstable.
Eh, what really is the problem with getting mplayer in Debian?
ok thanks.  so it is okay to get those few little things from debian unstable
I *think* mplayer and mozilla-mplayer may be okay. I am not very sure about mozilla-bonobo, considering Ubuntu is GNOME 2.8.
